issue.title: [CF 638] Showing two icons simultaneously
issue.body:
I am trying to make something which shows the icon of the buff I dispelled of an enemy target. However with the last patch shamans can now purge two magic buffs. I used this one to track one magic aura stolen:

^1^T^SPoint^T ^Sy^F-5340466467006295 ^f-46^Spoint ^STOP^SrelativePoint ^STOP^Sx ^F-8620242934235918^f-46 ^t^SScale^F4889573456698290 ^f-51^SEnabled ^B^SColumns ^N1^SIcons ^T^N1^T ^SType^Scleu ^SSourceUnit^Splayer ^SCLEUDur^N1 ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SPassingCndt^B ^SType^SAnimations ^SCndtJustPassed^B ^SOnlyShown^B ^SPeriod^N0.8 ^SValue^N0.8 ^SwasPassingCondition^B ^SAnimation^SICONALPHAFLASH ^SEvent^SOnDuration ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^S,I[@Kwkf2W,) ^STexts^T ^N1^S[Spell] ^N2^S ^t^t^t^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_DISPEL^B ^t^SEnabled^B ^SDestUnit^Starget ^t^t^t^N60345^S~`~| ^Sgroup^N47 ^^

I tried to make the aura for the second one by setting the timer of the second one really short 1e-10, and hoped it would show the second stolen aura due to lag, but it didn't work. Is there any way to track the second buff?


> Posted by CurseForge user daniel1992 | Imported from CurseForge issue #638 | Raw

comments.body:
Try creating two identical icons, but enable the "Don't Refresh" setting on one of the icons.

Let me know if this works for you or not, please.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Works perfectly, thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user daniel1992
